thread.section_title: Hilton Beijing Wangfujing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Service, Great Room and Quality Food
thread.title_full: Excellent Service, Great Room and Quality Food - Review of Hilton Beijing Wangfujing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Robert W
title: Excellent Service, Great Room and Quality Food
text: Excellent location as it was close to the Forbidden City and Tienanmen Square. Service and Guest Relations Manager were great, attentive and went above and beyond to ensure our stay was memorable and as an experience. The Junior Suite was beautiful, full amenities, clean and great view of the city. Although we required a wheelchair accessible room, the space and location of toilet, sinks, tub and shower was very accessible even though it was not considered an accessible room.
